properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry instrumentation is globally enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry instrumentation for the Logback Appender is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-arguments
properties.description: Enable the capture of Logback logger arguments.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-code-attributes
properties.description: Enable the capture of source code attributes. Note that capturing source code attributes at logging sites might add a performance overhead.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-experimental-attributes
properties.description: Enable the capture of experimental log attributes 'thread.name' and 'thread.id'.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-key-value-pair-attributes
properties.description: Enable the capture of Logback key value pairs as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-logger-context
properties.description: Enable the capture of Logback logger context properties as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-logstash-attributes
properties.description: Enable the capture of Logstash attributes, added to logs via 'Markers.append()', 'Markers.appendEntries()', 'Markers.appendArray()' and 'Markers.appendRaw()' methods.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-marker-attribute
properties.description: Enable the capture of Logback markers as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-mdc-attributes
properties.description: Comma separated list of MDC attributes to capture. Use the wildcard character '*' to capture all attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.num-logs-captured-before-otel-install
properties.description: Log telemetry is emitted after the initialization of the OpenTelemetry Logback appender with an OpenTelemetry object. This setting allows you to modify the size of the cache used to replay the first logs. 'thread.id' attribute is not captured.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.micrometer.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry instrumentation for the Micrometer bridge is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.resource.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry instrumentation for the Resource is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.resource.contributors.container.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Container resource contributor is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.resource.contributors.host-id.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Host ID resource contributor is enabled.
